A '''glow lichen''' is a [[feature]] that consist of several [[glow lichen]] blocks.  1-3, not diagonally within each feature.

== Generation ==
Glow lichen feature can be found in all the [[Overworld]] biomes. It generates on the four sides and lower surface of stone-like block including {{BlockLink|stone}}, {{blockLink|andesite}}, {{BlockLink|diorite}}, {{BlockLink|granite}}, {{BlockLink|dripstone block}}, {{BlockLink|calcite}}, {{BlockLink|tuff}}, and {{BlockLink|deepslate}}. It generates only in [[air]] and [[water]].
